title: This Works: Cosmetics
content:
Sort of like Century -- any ideas?  
thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120426195801im_/http:/typophile.com/files/this-works-2_3528.jpg)
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content:
I believe this is ITC Modern 216.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/modern-no-216/](http://web.archive.org/web/20120426195801/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/modern-no-216/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/modern-no-216/")

Looks like [Modern No. 20](http://web.archive.org/web/20120426195801/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atmodern-twenty/), but maybe a different cut of it.

Correction, I think Ryuk is right.

I definitely appreciate the help. I love this face.  
After doing a little comparisons on the links you gave me, I think it's the Elsner+Flake version of ITC Modern No 216, which seems a little lighter:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-modern-no-216/modern-no-216-ef-light...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120426195801/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-modern-no-216/modern-no-216-ef-light/waterfall.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-modern-no-216/modern-no-216-ef-light/waterfall.html")  
Thanks much.
